guild.description:
See a bug while using Ruqqus? File it here and we'll open an issue for the Ruqqus devs to resolve. Before posting, look around first to see if the bug hasn't already been filed. If so, just upvote it or leave a comment to show your support. When a bug is resolved, the status will be reported back in the original thread.

Please only use this guild to file _bugs_. For suggestions or feature requests, use +Ruqqus or +BetaFeedback.
guild.description_html:

If so, just upvote it or leave a comment to show your support. When a bug is resolved, the status will be reported back in the original thread.

Please only use this guild to file bugs. For suggestions or feature requests, use +Ruqqus or +BetaFeedback.
guild.name: RuqqusBugs

body:
I don't think you're stupid. I'm just a casual user who happened to be invited here because I made [this comment](https://ruqqus.com/+changelog/post/61dr/ruqqus-229-guildmaster-permissions/kxz9). [You've found bugs in the past, right](https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus/issues?q=author%3Acrystalvulpine)? (And sometimes tried to fix them yourself)

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
I don't think you're stupid. I'm just a casual user who happened to be invited here because I made this comment. You've found bugs in the past, right? (And sometimes tried to fix them yourself)

body: I find a few bugs, but only tiny stuff everyone else just didn't bother to report. Nothing like the insane stuff you find every day on top of everything else you do. I'm kind of a wannabe who is interested in things I wasn't born for.

body:
I'm the only one on the whole site without the breaker of ruqqus badge. I only got the white hat one by pure luck, and it was a really small thing too that was easy to spot. I can't look for bugs and think of weird scenarios to test out and I don't know anywhere near as much like sfrohne and maybe you, who can easily find huge bugs just by reading code casually even when it's almost impossible to catch. I've never found a single significant bug, while you and sfrohne find a bunch every single day.

It's because I'm stupid.
body_html:
I'm the only one on the whole site without the breaker of ruqqus badge. I only got the white hat one by pure luck, and it was a really small thing too that was easy to spot. I can't look for bugs and think of weird scenarios to test out and I don't know anywhere near as much like sfrohne and maybe you, who can easily find huge bugs just by reading code casually even when it's almost impossible to catch. I've never found a single significant bug, while you and sfrohne find a bunch every single day.

It's because I'm stupid.
